meta.description: Determine the number of trucks to send to warehouses A and B to meet material requirements at minimum cost.

sets.name: WAREHOUSES
sets.description: Warehouses from which materials are transported.

sets.name: MATERIALS
sets.description: Types of materials required for production.

params.name: transport_capacity
params.description: Transport capacity of each truck from each warehouse for each material.

params.name: freight_cost
params.description: Freight cost per truck from each warehouse.

params.name: material_requirement
params.description: Minimum required amount of each material.

vars.name: trucks
vars.description: Number of trucks to send from each warehouse.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total freight cost of sending trucks.

constraints.name: material_A_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 240 units of material A are transported.

constraints.name: material_B_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 80 kg of material B are transported.

constraints.name: material_C_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 120 tons of material C are transported.
